# NumberExtensions.ToNibbles method

Returns an array of bytes that contains the nibbles of this Byte.

```csharp
public static byte[] ToNibbles(this byte value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Byte to analyze. |

## Return Value

A byte Array that contains the result.
